title: HELP ME RIOT I CANT LOGIN TO MY ACC
body: For some reason when I login it doesn't work it says the user and pass doesn't match I invested time and money I tried yt tutorials I even saw a link to do something with config and lol client and to delete the things it says If u relaunch the game when ur In the middle of one it happens I did do that I didn't know it would mess up my acc and I did the thing it says it still dosent work plz help Username: ZeroadTV

replies.body: Looks like you were having some problems getting signed in due to an incorrect password, but I'm seeing that you've already had a ticket submitted and answered to get a password reset done. Were you still having this problem or were you able to get things straightened out in your ticket?
